name: Advanced Override
description:
The main objective of the game is to go through a series of puzzles in the ART factory. By doing so, the player will unlock new features for his droid. These features include Lo-gen walking, flying and talking like a human being, ultimately becoming sentient. The interaction between these two characters, Lo-gen and Lisa, is essential to completing the level. One cannot live without the other.

Any sort of pointers, reviews and opinions regarding the game, feel free to let us know. Be aware, this is a WIP, always susceptible to change.

Developed throughout a class under the course of Digital Games and Multimedia (IPL-ESTG, Portugal). By:

Alexandre Mendes 

Gonçalo Morgado,

Rui Ramos.
